quote_ar: لا تستسلم، فالفشل خطوة نحو النجاح.
quote_en: Don't give up, failure is a step to success.
Be strong, everything is temporary.
Believe in yourself and go.
Persistence makes the difference.
Turn your struggle into a path to success.
You are stronger than you think.
Success begins with a step — start now.
Make your dream bigger than your fear.

quote_ar: استمر، حتى وإن كان التقدم بطيئًا.
quote_en: Keep going, even if progress is slow.

quote_ar: لا أحد سيقاتل لأجلك، إلا أنت.
quote_en: No one will fight for you but you.
The road to success is full of challenges — face them.

quote_ar: الحلم لا يصبح حقيقة إلا بالعمل.
quote_en: A dream only becomes reality through work.
Every day is a new chance to change.

quote_ar: ثق أن الأفضل لم يأتِ بعد.
quote_en: Believe that the best is yet to come.

quote_ar: كُن أنت من يقرر لا الظروف.
quote_en: Be the one who decides, not your circumstances.
Fear is the enemy of progress.
Let exhaustion fuel your journey.

quote_ar: ما دمت تتنفس، فأنت لم تخسر.
quote_en: As long as you breathe, you haven't lost.
Success is not luck, it's determination.
Don't wait for the opportunity — create it.
Sometimes, all you need is to start.
Your strength lies in your consistency.
Success starts in your mind.
Don't underestimate your small steps.
Real failure is not trying at all.
Challenges create champions.

quote_ar: اختر أن تنهض في كل مرة تسقط فيها.
quote_en: Choose to rise every time you fall.
You shape your future with your decisions.
Don't wait for motivation — motivate yourself.

quote_ar: اعمل بجد، واهدأ، ودع النتائج تتكلم.
quote_en: Work hard, stay quiet, let results talk.
